text: Either by setting the task attributes to protected or by publishing getter methods.
creator: chwchw@gmx.de
bodewig@apache.org
text:
All of them?

The attributes should not become protected, getters would be OK.

creator: chwchw@gmx.de
text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> All of them?

Why not, yes. But especially the callee attribute.
